page.title: 16LOCAL HISTORY continued
page.content: {THE GENERAL CEMETERY Founded in 1836,recently half has been levelled to make a recreation area. The remaining area contains the more interesting tombs and monuments e.g. {Mark Firth-famous steel maker.}All the buildings are "listed" but need repairing but there is no public money available. {CONSERVATION AREA There are five areas in our block. Buildings and trees are protected . New buildings, extensions or alterations must be to a high standard. The{Broomhall estate}is an old{Victorian suburb.}The area declined as it became part of the inner-city. Since l970 this trend has been reversed. People have restored the houses back to family homes. Broom Hall,{once derelict is now restored.
